original_text: Once when we were going to the place of prayer, we were met by a female slave who had a spirit by which she predicted the future. She earned a great deal of money for her owners by fortune-telling.
korean_text: 우리가 기도하는 곳에 가다가 점치는 귀신 들린 여종 하나를 만나니 점으로 그 주인들에게 큰 이익을 주는 자라

sentences.original_text: Once when we were going to the place of prayer
sentences.korean_translation: 한번 우리가 기도하는 곳으로 갈 때

sentences.original_text: we were met by a female slave
by which she predicted the future
She earned a great deal of money
